name: tiny-evt
description: a tiny codebase built on vite for creating electron app with typescript and vue
author: Robocat<neatfx@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: cat scripts/dev-runner.esbuild.args | xargs esbuild && env-cmd -e dev node build/dev-runner.js
scripts.dist: cat scripts/app-builder.esbuild.args | xargs esbuild && node build/app-builder.js
scripts.cypress: cat scripts/dev-runner.esbuild.args | xargs esbuild && env-cmd -e dev,cypress node build/dev-runner.js
scripts.spectron: cat scripts/dev-runner.esbuild.args | xargs esbuild && env-cmd -e dev,spectron node build/dev-runner.js
